text: The fans are going crazy, they're asking for more revealing photos and some are even offering cash.
Wow, this is amazing! We're really going to make it big. Let's give them what they want and keep the money rolling in.
You know, we could take it even further. We could start recording videos and really give our fans something to talk about. What do you think?
You can now record videos! To unlock this feature, corrupt girlfriend_name one more time!
